summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 2021 regarding a request for communications between FBI Victim Specialists (VS) and victims, witnesses, or victims' attorneys involved in the Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The emails discuss the logistics of submitting a formal discovery request to obtain emails and text messages from the specialists.

persons.name: Program Manager
persons.role: Program Manager, Victim Program Management Unit, FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: An FBI program manager involved in coordinating the request for communications from Victim Specialists regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case.

persons.name: Victim Specialist
persons.role: Victim Specialist, FBI New York desk
persons.context: An FBI Victim Specialist from the New York desk identified as having assisted victims in the Epstein/Maxwell case.

events.title: FBI Internal Request for VS Communications
events.description: Internal FBI emails discuss submitting a formal request to obtain communications (emails, text messages) that FBI Victim Specialists had with victims, witnesses, or victims' attorneys involved in the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking communications between its Victim Specialists and parties involved in the Epstein/Maxwell case as of September 2021.
The request aimed to collect emails and text messages from Victim Specialists who assisted victims related to the investigation.
The case number referenced is SOD-NY-3027571.
The correspondence indicates coordination within the FBI's Victim Services Division and Victim Program Management Unit regarding this discovery request.
New Mexico is mentioned as a location to be added to the request list.
